quest.name: Retaking Territory
journal:
 Quest Sync
Catty is looking over the food stores, her face a mask of concern.
objectives: Slay two whiptails, then defeat the enraged Jaculus.

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: This should be enough to last us. At least until those scaly buggers are taken care of...

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: These days it seems there're more pests than people living in Stilltide, what with all the hopefuls running off to Eulmore.

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: Those flying lizards are the worst of the lot, though. You can't even leave for an honest day's work anymore without a swarm of them flapping sky demons nipping at your heels from here to Governor's Row.

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: And don't get me started on their leader! “Jaculus,” we call him. With the way that vicious blighter comes after you, you'd think he bloody owns the place!

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: Ugh, someone needs to topple that little tyrant. None of us fancy losing a finger, but maybe you're up to the challenge?

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: If you're keen to draw him out, just skewer a couple of his broodmates. That'll get his attention soon enough.

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: Did you say you were going to gut that territorial lizard leader for us? Like I said, just murder some of his mates, and you'll soon get an audience with Jaculus himself.

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: You got the bitey little bastard, then!? Shadows be praised! Now maybe we can work the fields in peace.

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: If you hadn't done the deed, I was afraid we'd start running out of food. And I've no wish to watch anyone starve to death...

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: Aye, I know we could move to Gatetown and live on handouts of meol like the rest of them, but we have our pride.

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: It's not like we could just move to Gatetown and live on handouts of meol anymore. Did you know that stuff was the flesh of sin eaters? <shudder> No bloody thank you.

dialogue.name: CATTY
dialogue.text: If there's any choice in the matter, we'd rather take care of our own needs while we can...with a little help from battle-savvy travelers such as yourself, of course!
